quiz.title: Google Cloud Data Protection and Security Best Practices Quiz

questions.questionText: There are a number of common challenges encountered by data engineers. Which of the following approaches best address the challenge of data accuracy and quality?
options: A. Consolidate disparate datasets and data formats into a data lake.
C. Manage server and cluster capacity and make sure that enough capacity exists to carry out the ETL jobs.
D. Build ETL pipelines to clean and transform data that is then stored in a data warehouse.
questions.explanation: Building ETL pipelines to clean and transform data ensures data accuracy and quality by processing the data to remove errors and inconsistencies before it is stored in a data warehouse.

questions.questionText: Which of the following statements are true? (Choose TWO)
options: A. BigQuery is a row-based storage.
B. Cloud SQL is optimized for high-throughput writes.
C. BigQuery is optimized for high-read data.
D. Cloud SQL is optimized for high-read data.
questions.explanation: Cloud SQL is optimized for high-throughput writes, making it suitable for transactional workloads. BigQuery is optimized for high-read data, making it ideal for analytical workloads.
